tuv.seg: A high performance camera mounted on the head of the machine, the power behind the AVS lies initssoftware which is fully integrated within the new AXYZ A2MC machine control system.
機台夾頭上裝有高性能攝影機，AVS 強大軟體功能已完全整合至新型 AXYZ A2MC 機台控制系統內。
ATC - Automatic Tool Changer
ATC - 自動換刀器
AXYZ Vision System
AXYZ 視覺系統
Accuracy Options
準確性配件
Accuracy Options - These machine options will help you locate your material and tools for more accurate cut parts.
準確性配件 - 幫助材料及工具定位的配件，以更準確地切削。
Advanced Carso software is included with the scanner which can edit the data before automatically creating the machining path forthe router to follow.
掃描器包含先進的 Carso 軟體，可於自動建立加工路徑前編輯數據。

Aluminium gantries provide an ideal balance of strength to mass formost cutting applications however forsituations that benefit from the greater mass of asteel gantry, our heavy duty steel gantries are available forany AXYZ Series machine.
鋁支架為大多數應用提供理想的強度與重量平衡，但 AXYZ 系列所有機台同時也為需要高負荷之應用提供鋼支架。
Amulti spindle drilling head isakey productivity tool forcabinet makers, case good manufacturers, custom millworkers, exhibit and display manufacturers.
多軸鑽頭為櫥櫃、箱件、客製木製品、展覽製造商之關鍵生產工具。
An integrated fume extraction grid is also available.
另有整合式抽氣網可供使用。
Aselection of optional interchangeable cartridges are available which can accommodate standard knife blades aswell aspizza wheel cutters, creasing wheels and 45degree blades.
具有選配可交換式刀匣可供選擇，刀匣同時適用於標準刀鋒、輪形刀、壓花輪以及 45 度角刀鋒。
Atangential knife isacutting blade that follows the plot lines of ashape byincrementally rotating the blade to match the path.
裁刀於切削時會配合切削路徑旋轉刀鋒，
Automatic feed drills are fixture mounted tools that combine linear feed and rotation forall drilling operations.
自動進給鑽頭為夾具安裝刀具，可結合線性進給和旋轉進給於所有鑽孔作業，
Automatic feed drills can be added to almost any carriage configuration.
自動進給鑽頭可添加至幾乎任何刀架組態

Available in3, 5 and 10HP models, and operating atmaximum speeds of18,000 (3 HP) and 24,000 rpm (5and 10 HP) with high-speed ceramic angular contact bearings, their excellent design provides years of trouble free use.
可用於 3、5 以及 10HP 型，使用高速陶瓷斜角軸承最大速度為 18,000 (3 HP) 和 24,000 rpm (5and 10 HP) ，其優異的設計提供了長久的耐用性。
Available with anon-marking contact base forpressure foot operation ora brush ring fornon-contact operation.
包含用於壓力腳操作之無痕接觸底座與非接觸式操作之刷環可供選擇。
Available with pneumatic feed and either pneumatic orelectric rotation.
可使用氣動進給和氣動或電動旋轉，
Both carriages may be configured with automatic tool changer carousels.
兩組刀皆可與自動換刀轉盤配合使用。
By bringing the hole drilling process onto your CNC Router, you can reduce the material handling and potential damage toyour components, and atthe same time reduce your labour costs.
藉由使用 CNC 雕刻機進行鑽孔作業，可減少材料處理與損傷工件的機會，同時能減少人力成本。
CNC System Options
CNC 系統配件
Collet Spindles
筒夾主軸

Combined with an HSD quick release spindle, and using aseven ortwenty-one position automatic carousel, the ATC system isthe fastest method ofchanging tools on a regular basis and willdeliver adramatic improvement inthroughput capacity when processing multiple tool operations.
結合 HSD 快速釋放主軸，並使用七或二十一段自動轉盤，ATC 系統為最快速的換刀系統並能藉由多重刀具操作大幅改進產出能力。
Configuration Options
組態配件
Configuration Options - These describe the different styles of gantry and tooling configurations that are currently available forAXYZ Systems.
組態配件 - AXYZ 系統目前可用之不同樣式的支架與加工組態。
Convert your Router to a plasma cutter in minutes.
快速由路達轉換為電漿切削器，
Cut aluminium, sheet metal and stainless steel upto 12mm thick atcutting speeds over 5m/min with excellent edge quality.
以超過 5m/min 的速度切削 12mm 以下的鋁、金屬板以及不鏽鋼，並有高品質切削邊緣。
Cutting Options
切削選項
Cutting Options - These are the primary cutting tools that are available, including routers, knives, drills and more.
切削配件 - 可用的主要切削工具，包括路達、刀具、鑽頭和更多的切削工具。
Drill heads are available ina5 tool Lshape ora9 tool Lshape.
有 5 頭 L 形或 9 頭 L 形鑽頭可供選擇。
Each carriage isindependently driven to maintain part accuracy.
每組刀架皆獨立驅動以保持精確度。
Easily mounts to the AXYZ machine to scan the surface of awork piece.
能簡便地安裝於 AXYZ 機台上以進行工件表面掃描。
Engraver
雕刻器
Extended Gantry Height
延長支架高度
Extended Gantry Length
延長支架長度
Extended clearances are available at200mm, 250mm and 300mm.
延長支架高度有 200mm、250mm 以及 300mm 可供選擇。
Extended gantries can also be utilised forcustom culling solutions where "off-the-table" material processing is required.
延長支架同時可使用於“非常規”之客製化換刀行程。
Extended gantry lengths allow forfull processing width when utilising wider carriages that accommodate multiple tools orwhen using multiple carriages.
延長支架長度以用於多重刀具所使用之較寬的刀架或用於多重刀架。
Faster and more flexible production isaseasy as choosing asingle, double oreven triple head carriage formultiple tasking operations.
選擇單頭、雙頭甚至三頭刀架以進行多工操作，能更快速且更靈活的生產。
For applications that need adeeper throat clearance such as mould making orthree dimensional carving, extended
用於需要更深的高度間隙之工件如模具製造或三維雕刻，可延長高度間隙。
For cutting non-ferrous metals including aluminium, brass and copper, the Unist mister operates with more precision and reliability than any other dispensing system available.
當切削非鐵金屬如鋁、黃銅以及銅，Unist 切削液噴嘴操作比起其他噴嘴系統更精準且更可靠。
For larger applications requiring full process width ofasingle carriage, the second carriage can conveniently be parked atthe end ofthe gantry.
當用於需要全部支架範圍之大型工件時，第二刀架可停放於支架末端。
Hardened steel pop-up location pins are pneumatically activated to allow fast, repeatable placement of your cutting materials onto the machine.
硬化鋼彈出式定位銷為氣動式驅動，可快速、重複放置切割材料於機台上。
Heavy Duty Collet Drag Knife
重型夾頭拖刀
Heavy Duty Steel Gantry
高負荷支架
Helical Rack
螺旋齒條
High Capacity Pressure Foot
高容量壓力腳
Includes torch, power supply and torch height control.
包含了電漿炬、電源供應器和電漿炬高度控制。
Integrated Solutions Delivering everything our Customers need
整合式解決方案提供我們的客戶一切所需
Intergrated pressure foot with adjustable tension tohold down materials under heavy cutpressures.
整合式可調張力壓力腳能於切割時的高壓下固定材料。
It can also be used forcutting vinyl on large format flex faced signs.
也可用於切割大型塑膠看板。
It is a particularly useful option forconverting existing templates and fixtures into automated cutting files where original drawings donot exist.
特別用於無原始圖檔時，轉換現有模板或裝置為自動切割檔案。
Itfitsto a standard 20mm collet and works with all5 HP and 10 HP spindles.
適用標準 20mm 夾頭，可用於所有 5 HP 和 10 HP 主軸。
Most of these options apply to the AXYZ Series machine exclusively.
以上配件多數為 AXYZ 系列機台獨有。
Multi Purpose Tangential Knife
多用途裁刀
Multi-Spindle Drilling Head
多軸鑽頭
Multiple Carriages
多重刀架
Multiple Gantries
多重支架
Multiple Tools
多重刀具
Multiple gantries on asingle machine bed offer the user flexibility inmachine use.
使用多重支架於單一機床上可使機台運用更為彈性。
Oscillating Knife
擺動刀
Other heights are available upon request.
其他高度可依需求另行訂做。
Others are available on the CAMTECH and PACER systems as well.
其他可用於 CAMTECH 和 PACER 系統，
Our Elte line of collet and covernut spindles is precision balanced forfast, clean cutting and ultra-quiet operation.
我們 Elte 產品線的筒夾和帽套主軸能提供快速、乾淨切削以及超靜音操作的平衡。
Plasma Cutting
電漿切削
Pneumatic/Electric Drills
氣動/電鑽
Pop-up Pins are the most reliable method of ensuring your materials are on straight; and with the fullpneumatic retraction, there is nofear of any cutting tool collision with the pin.
彈出銷為確保材料於一直線上最可靠的方法；且使用氣動收縮可避免刀具與彈出銷碰撞。
Pop-up location Pins
彈出式定位銷
Quick Release Spindles
快速釋放主軸
Rout.
選路、
Run different operations ateither end of the machine, or park one gantry forlarge job processing over virtually the entire machine length.
於機台兩端同時運行不同操作，當處理需要機台長度之大型工件時可將一支架停放於機台末端。
Scantech Surface Scanner
Scantech 表面掃描器
Secondary Options
輔助配件
Secondary Options - These are typically accessories to make more efficient use of your CNC Router, including misters, swarf collection feet and more.
輔助配件 - 幫助用戶更有效率地使用 CNC 雕刻機之配件，包括切削液噴嘴、集屑器腳座和更多的配件。
Speak toan AXYZ technical sales specialist to configure the machine to best suit your needs.
請向 AXYZ 技術銷售專員諮詢以獲得最適合您的需求之機台組態。
Speak toyour AXYZ technical sales person for more information.
更多資訊請向 AXYZ 技術銷售專員諮詢。
The 5.0HP and 10.8 HP HSD quick release spindles are incredibly quiet and robust.
5.0HP 和 10.8 HP HSD 快速釋放主軸極為安靜和耐用。
The 5Y pressure foot plays justasvital arole asthe high capacity pressure foot.
5Y 壓力腳與高容量壓力腳為同要重要的配件，
The AXYZ 7G and 21G automatic tool changer systems provide an easy and convenient method ofrunning jobsrequiring multiple routing tools.
AXYZ 7G 和 21G 自動換刀系統提供運行多路徑工作方便快捷的方法。
The AXYZ oscillating tangential knife option isan important tool forany company that needs to process thin flexible materials including foam core, gator foam, corrugated plastic orcardboard.
AXYZ 擺動裁刀配件為加工輕薄彈性材料之重要刀具，可處理泡棉，展立板、塑膠瓦楞或瓦楞紙，
The Hypertherm plasma cutting option with AXYZ machine and control excellence provides an unbeatable combination.
AXYZ 機台之 Hypertherm 電漿切削配件與優異的控制提供了無懈可擊的組合。
The cold airgun isasimple device that utilises filtered, compressed airand a venturi effect expansion chamber to produce cold airforspot cooling.
冷卻氣槍使用過濾壓縮空氣，並利用流量效應膨脹室產生冷空氣以進行冷卻。
The engraver equipped AXYZ Router table isagreat alternative forlarge format engraving.
裝有雕刻器之 AXYZ 路達桌為大型雕刻的良好選擇，
The engraver isspecifically designed forlight duty engraving on an AXYZ Series orMillennium CNC Router.
雕刻器為專門為了 AXYZ 系列或 Millennium CNC 雕刻機進行輕型所設計，
The heavy duty drag knife is designed for knife cutting applications that involve heavy gauge flexible materials.
重型拖刀專為重型彈性材料切割應用設計，

The helical pinions would normally be driven bythe optional high performance servo motors through precision planetary gearboxes, resulting inavery rigid and powerful drive system suitable foruse in all high precision and demanding applications.
螺旋齒條和齒輪可由高性能的選配伺服馬達透過行星齒輪變速箱驅動，可為高精密和高品質要求之應用提供穩定且強大的驅動系統
The helical rack and pinion system is designed to provide superior high speed performance delivering greater accuracy, smoother culling
螺旋齒條和齒輪系統之設計能提供優越的高速性能並提供更準確、更順暢的換刀
The high capacity swarf extraction foot isavital component ofyour AXYZ International CNC Router machine.
高容量集屑腳為 AXYZ 國際雕刻機台的重要的元件，
The laser digitiser provides afast and accurate way of capturing the geometry of any two dimentional part that is placed on the table.
雷射數位轉換器可快速且精確地抓取所有放置於路達桌上的二維零件外觀尺寸。
The machine options have been divided into 5 sections:
機台配件可分為五個部分：
The option set that AXYZ International has developed over the last 20years iseasily the most diverse in the industry.
AXYZ 國際在過去的 20 年所開發配件組合為業界最多元化的組合。
The pneumatic I electric combination is best forheavier duty orcontinuous use applications.
氣動/電動組合最適合於高負荷或連續使用之應用。

The primary application isdigital print finishing where the camera isable toquickly find and recognise conventional registration marks and adjust the machine cutting path to achieve exact alignment with printed shapes.
主要應用為攝影機可快速辨識數位列印圖層之傳統註冊標示，並調整機台切割路徑以精確符合列印圖形。
The result isacontinuous output of a microfine lubricant mist providing better cut finish and longer tool bitlife.
其連續噴出之微潤滑油霧提供更好的切削表面和更長的刀具壽命。
The standard gantry clearance is150mm for all AXYZ Series machines.
所有 AXYZ 系列機台標準支架高度為 150mm。
The tangential knife is arobust knife cutting tool intended forheavier, thicker and harder materials than atraditional drag knife can accommodate.
裁刀為耐用的切削刀具，用於傳統拖刀無法處理之較厚重以及較硬的材料。
The vinyl cutting knife can easily be attached without having to remove the spindle and asan added bonus, doubles asan effective pen plotter.
塑膠切割刀具可不拆除主軸直接外加安裝，如出圖機般的使用。
These materials allpresent challenges for traditional router orknife tools, but the oscillating knife can slice through these materials with ease, delivering clean cutedges without fraying.
上述材料由傳統路達或刀具加工具極具挑戰性，但擺動刀可輕易處理以上材料，提供乾淨的切邊。
This cost effective option eliminates heat related parts growth, most common to plastics and softmetal machining and serves to provide better edge finish and longer tool bitlife.
此高成本效益配件可避免塑膠和軟金屬加工常見的熱相關零件膨脹，並提供更好的邊緣表面及更長的刀具壽命。
This method provides forstraight cut corners atany angle aswell astrue radii when called for.
此方法能提供邊角直線切割同時能依要求半徑導角。
This tooling configuration is popular forapplications that typically require only two orthree tooling processes.
此加工組態常用於一般僅使用兩刀或三刀之加工製程。
Three dimensional laser scanner forreverse engineering a 3D surface.
用於三維表面逆向工程之三維雷射掃描器。
Through ongoing research and development, and close ties with our industry partners and vendors, AXYZ has been able to create a large set of machine options that add enormous value toour customers.
藉由不斷進行研發，並與業界合作夥伴和供應商的密切合作，AXYZ 有能力生產為我們客戶帶來極大價值之大型機台配件組合。
To improve efficiency, multiple carriages can be mounted on one gantry toallow you to run multiple versions ofthe same job.
可安裝多重刀架於支架上同時進行多份相同工作以增加效率。
Unist Mister
Unist 切削液噴嘴
Universal 5Y Pressure Foot
通用 5Y 壓力腳
Use forscanning hand made or old parts forwhich CAD data is not available.
用於手工製作零件或無 CAD 資料之老舊零件掃描。
Used primarily for large format vinyl cutting, cutting paper mask onacrylic sheets for painting, and forcutting paint grip with standard vinyl cutting blades and blade holder.
主要用於大型塑膠工件切割、切割壓克力噴漆樣版以及切割膠漆塗料，使用標準塑膠切割刀具與刀架，
Vacuum System Options - These options include vacuum hold down pumps and blowers, as well as swarf collection systems.
真空系統配件 - 包括真空吸附泵和風機，以及集屑系統。
Vinyl Knife
塑膠刀
Vortex Cold Guns
渦流冷卻槍
With an industry proven 6.35mm top-loading spindle, it iswell suited totackle awide range of materials including plastics, aluminium, brass, and more.
使用業界認證的 6.35mm 上載式主軸，其適用於夾固多種材料如塑膠、鋁、黃銅以及更多材料。
With asimple yetpowerful pneumatic quick release feature, these spindles can be operated manually orinconjunction with ourATC automatic tool changer carousel forautomatic changing oftool bits.
藉由簡單強大的氣動快速釋放裝置，主軸可以手動操作或結合 ATC 自動換刀轉盤進行自動換刀。
With four mounting bolts and aquick power disconnect plug, it is very easy toinstall and uninstall from the table.
其包含四個安裝螺栓和快速電源插頭，非常容易從路達桌上裝卸。
Without excellent extraction ofthe swarf and dust that iscreated, the mess created can be time consuming tocleanup, and can be aworking hazard foryour employees.
若無優異的切屑和灰塵吸取功能，會消耗許多清理時間，並可能對員工造成危害。
and quieter running.
以及更安靜的運行。
clearances are available.
laser Digitiser
雷射數位轉換器
profile, trim and drill inaseamless sequence.
切削、修邊以及鑽孔無間斷地進行。
